mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_BOARD bod, TB_FILES fil WHERE bod.bodno = fil.bodno and bod.bodname = #{bodname} and fil.filidx ='0' order by bod.bodno asc
SELECT * FROM TB_BOARD bod, TB_FILES fil WHERE bod.bodno = #{bodno} and fil.bodno = #{bodno}
SELECT pfSavefile, pfText FROM (select pfSavefile, pfText from TB_PROFILE WHERE MEMID=#{memid} order by PFDATE desc) p WHERE rownum =1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PROFILE(memid, pfImg, pfText, pfOriginfile, pfSavefile, pfSize, pfDate) VALUES(#{memid}, null,#{pfText},#{pfOriginfile},#{pfSavefile},#{pfSize},sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_PROFILE SET MEMID = #{memid}, PFIIMG = null, PFTEXT = #{pfText}, pfOriginfile = #{pfOriginfile}, pfSavefile = #{pfSavefile}, pfSize = #{pfSize}, pfDate = sysdate WHERE MEMID = #{memid}
